glsa.title: policycoreutils: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in policycoreutils could lead to local privilege escalation.

background.p: policycoreutils is a collection of SELinux policy utilities.

description.p: The seunshare utility is owned by root with 4755 permissions which can be exploited by a setuid system call.

impact.p: A local attacker may be able to gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All policycoreutils users should upgrade to the latest version:
